dict.acceptation: 离开，离去；起程；背离；东西距离；

sent.orig: Day 1 Departure Check-in airport for departure.
sent.trans: 1出发今天往机场办理登机手续。

sent.orig: You may proceed to the departure section, and go through the procedures for departure there.
sent.trans: 您现在可以去出境处，办理出境手续。

sent.orig: After the departure clearance, passengers want to fly to the departure lounge waiting board the flight.
sent.trans: 出境检查结束后，旅客到所要搭乘的航班候机室等候登机。

sent.orig: The bubble ratio, departure volume and departure period were measured for different electric field strengths.
sent.trans: 实验研究表明：随着电场强度的增大，气泡的长径比变大，脱离体积变小，脱离周期变短。

sent.orig: Passenger should check in departure lounge at least 15 minutes before departure time.
sent.trans: 请于15分钟到达候机室，办理登机手续。
